subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Michael Beasley scored 30 points yesterday, most of them during a critical second-half run, to help No. 25 Kansas State beat Division II Pittsburg State, 76-66, and avoid an upset at home.
snippet: Michael Beasley scored 30 points yesterday, most of them during a critical second-half run, to help No. 25 Kansas State beat Division II Pittsburg State, 76-66, and avoid an upset at home.
